agency_desc: A partnership with a goal of reducing the cost of medicine for children, families, and individuals by providing a free resource for immediate savings on prescription medications.
service_description: Offers a discount prescription card that provides an average savings of around 45% on prescriptions purchased at participating pharmacies. Actual discount will vary; may not be used with other discount cards or to reduce an insurance co-pay. This card is accepted at most major pharmacies; see the website for a complete list.
site_details: Text "family" to 700700 to receive a free FamilyWize-United Way prescription discount card via text -- Visit website to request a card to be mailed -- Download free mobile app in the App Store or Google Play for immediate use of the card. -- Call for more information
